attributes.action: Reform the British education system based on the Finnish education system
attributes.additional_details: School takes up too much unnecessary time, this time could be spent better with family and friends as socialising is important mentally. Furthermore, by using this system we could increase kids productivity and willingness to learn. Also, we could finally teach kids things which are important to learn such as basic life lessons. There are many more issues that need to be solved in our education system, as such I hope we follow the Finnish system as a guiding principle to resolve many issues.
attributes.background: Simply put, follow suit in Finnish footsteps and copy their education system. Create a system where kids can just be kids and where education doesn’t feel like a burden and takes up unnecessary time.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action, but your petition doesn't explain how the Finnish education system differs from the current situation in England and so doesn't explain what changes you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
